alert.note: Alert for Maricopa; Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 21 at 1:18PM MST until September 21 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: The National Weather Service in Phoenix has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Maricopa County in south central Arizona... Pinal County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 715 PM MST. * At 118 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain in Vekol Wash. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. The heavy rainfall is expected to produce a flood wave that will travel along Vekol Wash and impact downstream road crossings. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Maricopa, Freeman and Ak-Chin Village. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
